00029 #import "GHNSDate+Parsing.h"
00030 
00031 // Date formatters are not cached since they are not thread-safe. (Thanks Jae!)
00032 // TODO: Investigate synchronized access to cached formatters.
00033 
00034 @implementation NSDate (GHParsing)
00035 
00036 + (NSDate *)gh_parseISO8601:(NSString *)dateString { 
00037   if (!dateString) return nil;
00038   return [[self gh_iso8601DateFormatter] dateFromString:dateString];
00039 }
00040 
00041 + (NSDate *)gh_parseRFC822:(NSString *)dateString {
00042   if (!dateString) return nil;
00043   return [[self gh_rfc822DateFormatter] dateFromString:dateString];
00044 }
00045 
00046 + (NSDate *)gh_parseHTTP:(NSString *)dateString {  
00047   if (!dateString) return nil;
00048   NSDate *parsed = nil;
00049   parsed = [[self gh_rfc1123DateFormatter] dateFromString:dateString];
00050   if (parsed) return parsed;
00051   parsed = [[self gh_rfc850DateFormatter] dateFromString:dateString];
00052   if (parsed) return parsed;
00053   parsed = [[self gh_ascTimeDateFormatter] dateFromString:dateString];
00054   return parsed;
00055 }
00056 
00057 + (NSDate *)gh_parseTimeSinceEpoch:(id)timeSinceEpoch {
00058   return [self gh_parseTimeSinceEpoch:timeSinceEpoch withDefault:timeSinceEpoch];
00059 }
00060 
00061 + (NSDate *)gh_parseTimeSinceEpoch:(id)timeSinceEpoch withDefault:(id)value {
00062   if (!timeSinceEpoch) return value;
00063   return [NSDate dateWithTimeIntervalSince1970:[timeSinceEpoch longLongValue]];
00064 }
00065 
00066 - (NSString *)gh_formatRFC822 {
00067   return [[[self class] gh_rfc822DateFormatter] stringFromDate:self];
00068 }
00069 
00070 - (NSString *)gh_formatHTTP {
00071   return [[[self class] gh_rfc1123DateFormatter] stringFromDate:self];
00072 }
00073 
00074 - (NSString *)gh_formatISO8601 {
00075   return [[[self class] gh_iso8601DateFormatter] stringFromDate:self];
00076 }
00077 
00078 + (NSDateFormatter *)gh_rfc822DateFormatter {  
00079   NSDateFormatter *gh_rfc822DateFormatter = [[[NSDateFormatter alloc] init] autorelease];     
00080   [gh_rfc822DateFormatter setFormatterBehavior:NSDateFormatterBehavior10_4];
00081   // Need to force US locale when generating otherwise it might not be 822 compatible
00082   [gh_rfc822DateFormatter setLocale:[[[NSLocale alloc] initWithLocaleIdentifier:@"en_US"] autorelease]];    
00083   [gh_rfc822DateFormatter setTimeZone:[NSTimeZone timeZoneForSecondsFromGMT:0]];
00084   [gh_rfc822DateFormatter setDateFormat:@"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss ZZZ"];
00085   return gh_rfc822DateFormatter;
00086 }
00087 
00088 + (NSDateFormatter *)gh_iso8601DateFormatter {
00089   // Example: 2007-10-18T16:05:10.000Z  
00090   NSDateFormatter *gh_is8601DateFormatter = [[[NSDateFormatter alloc] init] autorelease];
00091   [gh_is8601DateFormatter setFormatterBehavior:NSDateFormatterBehavior10_4];
00092   // Need to force US locale when generating otherwise it might not be 8601 compatible
00093   [gh_is8601DateFormatter setLocale:[[[NSLocale alloc] initWithLocaleIdentifier:@"en_US"] autorelease]];    
00094   [gh_is8601DateFormatter setTimeZone:[NSTimeZone timeZoneForSecondsFromGMT:0]];
00095   [gh_is8601DateFormatter setDateFormat:@"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'"];
00096   return gh_is8601DateFormatter;
00097 }
00098 
00099 + (NSDateFormatter *)gh_rfc1123DateFormatter {
00100   // Example: "Wed, 01 Mar 2006 12:00:00 GMT"
00101   NSDateFormatter *gh_rfc1123DateFormatter = [[[NSDateFormatter alloc] init] autorelease];     
00102   [gh_rfc1123DateFormatter setFormatterBehavior:NSDateFormatterBehavior10_4];
00103   // Need to force US locale when generating otherwise it might not be 822 compatible
00104   [gh_rfc1123DateFormatter setLocale:[[[NSLocale alloc] initWithLocaleIdentifier:@"en_US"] autorelease]];    
00105   [gh_rfc1123DateFormatter setTimeZone:[NSTimeZone timeZoneForSecondsFromGMT:0]];
00106   [gh_rfc1123DateFormatter setDateFormat:@"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss zzz"]; 
00107   return gh_rfc1123DateFormatter;
00108 }
00109 
00110 + (NSDateFormatter *)gh_rfc850DateFormatter {
00111   // Example: Sunday, 06-Nov-94 08:49:37 GMT
00112   NSDateFormatter *gh_rfc850DateFormatter = [[[NSDateFormatter alloc] init] autorelease];
00113   [gh_rfc850DateFormatter setFormatterBehavior:NSDateFormatterBehavior10_4];
00114   [gh_rfc850DateFormatter setLocale:[[[NSLocale alloc] initWithLocaleIdentifier:@"en_US"] autorelease]];
00115   [gh_rfc850DateFormatter setTimeZone:[NSTimeZone timeZoneForSecondsFromGMT:0]];
00116   [gh_rfc850DateFormatter setDateFormat:@"EEEE, dd-MMM-yy HH:mm:ss zzz"];
00117   return gh_rfc850DateFormatter;
00118 }
00119 
00120 + (NSDateFormatter *)gh_ascTimeDateFormatter {
00121   // Example: Sun Nov  6 08:49:37 1994
00122   NSDateFormatter *gh_ascTimeDateFormatter = [[[NSDateFormatter alloc] init] autorelease];
00123   [gh_ascTimeDateFormatter setFormatterBehavior:NSDateFormatterBehavior10_4];
00124   [gh_ascTimeDateFormatter setLocale:[[[NSLocale alloc] initWithLocaleIdentifier:@"en_US"] autorelease]];
00125   [gh_ascTimeDateFormatter setTimeZone:[NSTimeZone timeZoneForSecondsFromGMT:0]];
00126   [gh_ascTimeDateFormatter setDateFormat:@"EEE MMM d HH:mm:ss yyyy"];
00127   return gh_ascTimeDateFormatter;
00128 }
00129 
00130 @end
